data.author: BiDuSoft

changelog.release_notes: _ Fix the timeshift for Pebble OG running 3.8.0 (make sure you update the Android app as well)

_ Pebble Time Round support 
_ Updated color scheme 
_ Improve sleep data syncing

_ NEW: Idle/Inactivity alert
_ Sync improvement
_ Sleep tracking accuracy improvement
_ Fix crash when switching between pedometer and sleep tracker

2.0 Release:
_ Sleep Tracker
_ Tasker Support
_ Pebble Time support
_ Sync Enhancement
_ Sync enhancement
Fix issue where the steps and active time won't reset when background worker not running
_ Added icon to indicate when pause tracking is turned on
Minor battery optimization

_ Beta test new algorithm choice
_ Added option to choose different update frequency to conserve battery
_ Fix potential bug for watch not updating and steps stacked when not being able to reset

_ Fix 100% battery shown as 10%
_ Added options to indicate default setting
_ Added support for step counts + active min restored
_ Step threshold options (2-5 is now available)
_ Battery optimization by caching and removing unneeded calculation
_ Address bug where the background worker was shutdown and never started again.

_ Fixed a bug causing pause tracking not to work
_ Slight battery optimization
_ Fixed a bug where pause tracking stops working when sensitivity or calibration were changed.
Battery optimization (~10%-20% improvement)

New features: added calibration reset option, sync calibration data and sensitivity settings with Android apps.
Improvement: Increase the interval calibration
Under the hood: code refactoring to prepare for sleep tracking integration

_ Fixed battery leaks
_ Improve restoring when switch to PlexFit from another app

Added full customization of sensitivity levels and filter for users to customize to their likings.
Added calibration option.

Completely rewrote syncing algorithm to be more reliable
Fix a bug where users go beyond 10000 steps and the steps get truncated
Added version and battery level syncing to be compatible with the new PlexFit 1.1.0 Android App

_ New tracking algorithm which greatly reduce sensitivity
_ Tweaked logging algorithm to reduce syncing issues
Restore the original sensitivity

data.description:
Why PlexFit ?
PlexFit is the most customizable and the most comprehensive fitness tracking solution available today on the Pebble. It has walking, sleeping, running and biking and more. It also syncs all the fitness data to Google Fit, making it a hard-to-beat solution if you have an Android phone.



Key Features
• The only fitness tracker that fully supports the whole Pebble line-up (Pebble Classic, Pebble Time, Pebble Time Round)

• A complete fitness tracking solution: all fitness tracking features have been implemented (walking, sleeping, running, biking), inactivity alert, etc... so you do not need to install separate apps to do all of these.

• Seamless integration with Google Fit platform (now with MyFitnessPal support)

• The most customizable fitness tracker available for the Pebble today.

• Background data collection so that users do not need to have their app opening all the times

• App is fully compliant with Material Design and use the latest design cues available for Material Design guidelines

• Stylishly designed Pebble Watchface to make you stand out in any circumstances


Words from the Developers
We have spent a lot of time and many sleepless nights to develop this app. This app was designed to empower the users and to allow you to have more control over your fitness data. Please enjoy it as much as we have enjoyed creating it.



Contact
For any support or inquiry, please email plexfit.software@gmail.com



Our website
http://bidusoft.blogspot.com/

latest_release.release_notes: _ Fix the timeshift for Pebble OG running 3.8.0 (make sure you update the Android app as well)

data.title: PlexFit for Pebble
